name: red-nectar
effect: Changes Oricorio to Baile Style. Single-use and cannot be used in battle.

flavor_text.sun_moon: A flower nectar obtained at Ula’ula Meadow. It changes the form of certain species of Pokémon.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: A flower nectar obtained at Ula’ula Meadow. It changes the form of certain species of Pokémon.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: A flower nectar obtained at Ula’ula Meadow. It changes the form of certain species of Pokémon.
